alert.note: Alert for Martin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 9:28PM EDT until July 06 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Martin County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 928 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Robersonville, or 12 miles east of Tarboro, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Williamston, Robersonville, Gold Point, Hamilton, Oak City, Parmele, Everetts, Hassell and Beargrass. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
